segments.text: You're going to Shanghai tomorrow , are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . Do you think it'll be cold ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It might be . You'd better take a heavy sweater with you.The nights are usually quite cold at this time of year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think I'll need a cotton coat ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not for now , I think , But I believe there'll be rain , so take your raincoat with you .
segments.speaker: S1
